channel.title: Setting up a 508 client?
channel.description: Yeah im probley asking the most nooby question and i wont be suprised if its siggied, But i build and run my client and it says "Connecting to Update Server..." and doesnt move.... Im mainly thinking its the wrong IP because I cant find where im supposed to put my server IP in?
